lines.text:
[Squeezing between two hypnotized "zombies"]
Move over boys, I'm one of the gang now.
What you doing in that lineup?
Don't bother me woman. Can't you see I is a has-been?
Nothing else but. And don't ask me my name, 'cuz I don't know. I don't know nothing.
You ain't no zombie, 'cuz zombies can't talk.
Can I help it 'cuz I'm loquacious?

[Eating the food set out for the zombies]
This being a zombie sure is a drawback. Where's the salt?
You eats that the way it is and likes it. Zombies ain't supposed to use salt.

[Samantha brings Jeff the salt]
I thought you said!

[Samantha continues to pour the salt]
That's more like it. Take it easy there woman, I ain't no herring!

[Samantha keeps pouring the salt]
Whew! What is you trying to do? Poison me?

[hearing voodoo drums]
It ain't Gene Krupa!
It's the same drums we heard the other night. Voodoo drums! Come on, we've got to find him!
Oh Mr. Billy, we found enough for one day!

[about to chase off after another eerie happening]
Come on!
I cain't, my foot done took to root.
